name: Sexy Scripting Language
short_description:
A strongly-typed object-oriented imperative language, designed to script C++ classes, C functions and C structures.

It is fully reflective inside and outside the language. C++ can query the compilation units for all namespaces, structures, classes, interfaces and functions. A debugging API allows for full stack interrogation and step-by-step debugging.

Execution is done with a virtual machine optimized for virtual method calls.

Sexy is an s-expression language with its own flavour of s-macros.

A script language optimized for game programming, using polymorphic stack allocated objects with no garbage collection. All interfaces generate a null object implementation, thus doing away with null reference exceptions.

Error handling is done in C# style try...catch...finally exceptions.

Includes Benny-Hill generator for generating interoperable classes between sexy and C++.
summary: An s-expression language for video games
